attributes.action: Creating budget and services for those suffering from Mental Health.
attributes.additional_details: The Government have created these restrictions for the safety of the public, but have not thought about the affects this would have for those who already suffer from mental health, and those who are only now experiencing it first hand.
attributes.background: I would like the government to rethink about mental health services, and the importance of having this available now more than ever. During a time where mental health is at its worst, due to the Pandemic.
